title: The Vision
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray, John Shaw and Greg Reading
brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “The Little world of Dietmar Fill”.
This video concentrates on the alpine flora and fauna but also discusses Dietmar’s vision of the natural world. It focuses in the corroboree frog and again, the photography is excellent. Narrated by Robyn Williams.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Don Murray, John Shaw and Greg Reading
